lead_paragraph: For businesses and residents, the lack of a bank is an inconvenience, but it is also a problem that officials say has stunted the business community there.
snippet: For businesses and residents, the lack of a bank is an inconvenience, but it is also a problem that officials say has stunted the business community there.

headline.main: In a Slice of the Bronx, No Banks in Sight, for Now
headline.seo: In Van Nest Section of the Bronx, No Banks in Sight
